# imageResolution

**Instance Property**

The width and height, in pixels, of the captured camera image.

## Declaration

```swift
var imageResolution: CGSize { get }
```

## Discussion

This size describes the image in the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFrame/capturedImage] buffer, which contains image data in the camera device’s native sensor orientation. To convert image coordinates to match a specific display orientation of that image, use the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARCamera/viewMatrix(for:)] or [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARCamera/projectPoint(_:orientation:viewportSize:)] method.

## Examining Imaging Parameters

- **intrinsics**: A matrix that converts between the 2D camera plane and 3D world coordinate space.
